snippet.title: Disney Villains Cursed Café - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Disney Villains Cursed Café is a new visual novel where every magical potion sparks unexpected twists. As the newest Potionista of this mysterious café, you'll craft magical blends for reimagined villains—Cruella de Vil, The Evil Queen, Gaston, Captain Hook, Jafar, Maleficent, and Ursula—each chasing new modern ambitions. 

Your choices shape their story as you ponder on which potion to serve, deciding whether to give them what they want, or a taste of what they truly need. With help from Yzma and your potion book, uncover new enchanted ingredients and recipes, as you work to uncover the mystery of this peculiar café. With stunning artwork, immersive storytelling, and a dash of alchemy, a spellbinding experience awaits.

Disney Villains Cursed Cafe is available to play now on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC for Steam and GOG. 

SUBSCRIBE to get notified when new Disney videos are posted: http://di.sn/Subscribe

Get even more from Disney!
Instagram: http://Instagram.com/Disney
Twitter: http://Twitter.com/Disney
Facebook: http://Facebook.com/Disney
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@disney
Website: https://www.disney.com/

A Little Disney History: From humble beginnings as a cartoon studio in the 1920s to its preeminent name in the entertainment industry today, Disney proudly continues its legacy of creating world-class stories and experiences for every member of the family.
